name: a10-networks-snippets
readme:
# A10 Networks Snippets

This snippets package provides frequently used building blocks for aFleX (a TCL based scripting language) for the A10 Networks AX and Thunder devices.

### Snippets Included

* prefix: `comment`
```
#
# Copyright 2014, <start>
# Version 1.0 - <tab marker>
#
# Description: <tab marker>
#
# Scalability of this aFleX is unknown.
#
```

* prefix: `when`
```
when RULE_INIT {
    set ::DEBUG 0
}
when HTTP_REQUEST {
    <start>
}
```

* prefix: `switch`
```
switch -glob <start> {
    <tab marker>
}
```

* prefix: `foreach`
```
foreach item <start> {
    <tab marker>
}
```

* prefix: `ifnot`
```
if { not (<start>) } {
    <tab marker>
}
```

* prefix: `ifelse`
```
if { <start> } {
    <tab marker<
} else {
    <tab marker>
}
```

* prefix: `elseif`
```
if { <start> } {
    <tab marker>
} elseif { <tab marker> } {
    <start>
}
```

* prefix: `log1`
```
if { $::DEBUG == 1 } { log "<start>" }
```

* prefix: `log2`
```
if { $::DEBUG >= 1 } { log "<start>" }
```

* prefix: `log3`
```
if { $::DEBUG > 2 } { log "<start>" }
```

* prefix: `respond`
```
HTTP::respond 200 content "<start>"
```

* prefix: `tolower`
```
[string tolower [HTTP::<start>]]
```

Contributions are welcome! Fork and pull!
